name: @kiali/kiali-ui
homepage-comment: *Do not* change this setting if you wish run Kiali under different server root.
Instead update 'web_root' in Kaili config map in OpenShift console.
author: Red Hat
script-comments: When adding new scripts, please be careful to using `npm run` instead of `yarn` for the tasks.
Some build environments we use do not include npm access, and installing yarn is not possible.

scripts.build: if [ "${KIALI_ENV}" = "production" ]; then npm run build:prod; else npm run build:dev; fi
scripts.build:dev: sh -ac '. ./.env.upstream; npm run lint && npm run build:kiali'
scripts.build:kiali: npm run i18n && REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version REACT_APP_NAME=$npm_package_name GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false EXTEND_ESLINT=true react-scripts build --profile
scripts.cypress: cypress open -e TAGS="@core-1 or @core-2 or @crd-validation or @perses"
scripts.cypress:run: cypress run -e TAGS="@core-1 or @core-2" && cypress run -e TAGS="@crd-validation" && cypress run -e TAGS="@perses"
scripts.cypress:run:ambient: cypress run -e TAGS="@ambient" && cypress run -e TAGS="@waypoint"
scripts.cypress:run:ambient-multi-primary: cypress run -e TAGS="@ambient-multi-primary" && cypress run -e TAGS="@waypoint-multicluster"
scripts.cypress:run:ambient:junit: cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json -e TAGS="@ambient" && cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json -e TAGS="@waypoint"
scripts.cypress:run:ambient-multi-primary:junit: cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json -e TAGS="@ambient-multi-primary" && cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json -e TAGS="@waypoint-multicluster"
scripts.cypress:run:junit: cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json -e TAGS="@core-1 or @core-2" && cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json -e TAGS="@crd-validation"
scripts.cypress:run:multi-cluster:junit: cypress run --reporter cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json -e TAGS="@multi-cluster and not @multi-primary"
scripts.lint:precommit: unset GIT_DIR && git diff --cached --name-only HEAD --diff-filter=AM | grep -E '\.tsx?$' | cut -d'/' -f2- | xargs -r eslint -c .eslintrc_precommit
scripts.pre-commit: yarn run pretty-quick --staged --no-restage --bail --pattern "**/*.{ts,tsx,scss,json}" && npm run lint:precommit && npm run format:precommit
scripts.start: if [ "${KIALI_ENV}" = "production" ]; then npm run start:prod; else npm run start:dev; fi
scripts.start:kiali: npm run i18n && REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version REACT_APP_NAME=$npm_package_name REACT_APP_GIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) react-scripts start
scripts.start:mock: npm run generate:chatbot-conversations && npm run msw:init && sh -ac '. ./.env.upstream; REACT_APP_MOCK_API=true npm run start:kiali'
scripts.postinstall: find node_modules/@patternfly -name '*.css' -exec sed -i -e 's/justify-content: start;/justify-content: flex-start;/g' -e 's/align-items: start;/align-items: flex-start;/g' -e 's/justify-content: end;/justify-content: flex-end;/g' -e 's/align-items: end;/align-items: flex-end;/g' {} +
